page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date relative templates namespace
page.description: The namespace for templates used in relative dates. See *[link:Date.toRelative]*.

property.name: before
property.description: The template to use when the date is before the current date. The relative date is included by inserting "{data}" into the template. The default template is "{data} ago".

property.name: after
property.description: The template to use when the date is after the current date. The relative date is included by inserting "{data}" into the template. The default template is "in {data}".

page.note: Any properties in this namespace can be replaced in order to support other languages or formats.
